korean: 재밌는 이야기가 많아서 혼자 웃으면서 봤다.
나도 몇 마디 거들고 나니까 또 대화가 시작됐다.
english: There were 200 messages piled up in my friends' group chat.
It took 30 minutes just to read them all.
There were so many funny stories that I laughed by myself while reading.
After I chimed in with a few words, the conversation started up again.
